extractFactDictList.question: What is the plot of 'Sorry, Wrong Number'?
extractFactDictList.sentence: This gripping suspense drama follows the story of a woman named Mrs. Stevenson, who mistakenly overhears a plot to commit murder over a crossed telephone line.
